mapper.select: SELECT user_id friend_id,user_name, user_phone, user_img,user_area FROM user WHERE user_phone = #{userId} OR user_name LIKE CONCAT(#{userId},'%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO friend_request (request_id,user_id, friend_id, request_info,request_state) VALUES (#{requestId},#{userId},#{friendId},#{requestInfo},#{requestState})
mapper.select: SELECT f.friend_id,f.friend_user_id,f.friend_remark_name, u.user_name,u.user_sex,u.user_img FROM friend f INNER JOIN user u ON u.user_id = f.user_id WHERE u.user_id IN (SELECT friend_user_id FROM friend WHERE user_id = #{userId}) AND f.friend_user_id = #{userId}

SELECT f.friend_id,f.user_id,f.friend_remark_name,f.friend_remark_text, u.user_name,u.user_phone,u.user_area,u.user_address,u.user_img FROM friend f INNER JOIN user u ON u.user_id = f.user_id WHERE f.friend_id = #{friendId}

SELECT f.friend_user_id,f.user_id,f.friend_remark_name, u.user_name,u.user_img,u.user_sex FROM friend f INNER JOIN user u ON u.user_id = f.user_id WHERE f.user_id = #{userId} AND f.friend_user_id = #{friendUserId}
